Topic.Title: INTC Useless

Message.Msg: "INTC had a nice run up to $29 and change. It's going to struggle from here on out." *** Who could disagree? No one uses computers. The internet is dead. No one buys smartphones that connect to servers. No one is putting processors into cars, signs, or ATMs. No one buys tablets that connect to servers. No medical device uses a processor. Video streaming and downloads decline every day. No one stores music, video or data in the Cloud. No one will ever put a processor in an appliance. The Internet of Things is a myth. The sharing of data and information seldom happens any more. Students rarely use computers or notebooks. No one ever upgrades a processing device or buys more than one in a lifetime. Yep, it seems totally clear. Intel is selling products that just aren't needed in society. The information age is over...
